title: I'm scared to pick up fizz again
body: Hello all so I have a 202764 points on fizz but I haven't played him since changes, can any one give me any advice how I should play him differently as before the w change ? any advice is appreciated ʕ •ᴥ•ʔ

replies.body: well he got a nice buff this patch so we'll have to wait and see. I was honestly been meaning to try him Tank again since his W is now an Auto buff again. We'll see.
